Articles.Content:
Just bought the game today.
Had to start it directly due to Steam being broken.

As in the title the game gets stuck at "Loading Expansions: Breaking Ground (1/2)".

Console threw a crapton of "Bones do not match bindpose" errors.

Using KSP version 1.4.5.

Specs are as follows:
2.6 GHz AMD Athlon 64 5000B

4 GB RAM

NVIDIA GeForce 6150SE nForce 430

Windows 7 SP1 (x86)

You don't have to tell me that these specs are lackluster.

EDIT: Forgot to mention that the game is unmodded, apart from both DLCs (Making History and Breaking Ground). Since I'm using a 32-bit operating system, I am forced to use versions prior to 1.5.

Edited October 24, 2021 by Yoshi128k
Add information.
